languages.text: "И ты стал{mf||а}". {n}Маражай прикрывает глаза.{/n} "Ты разделил{mf||а} со мной мою страсть. Мою причину жить. Мое естество. Это — то, насколько мы можем быть близки, оставаясь теми кто мы есть".
"And now you are." {n}Marazhai's eyelids lower.{/n} "We shared my passion. My reason for living. My nature. This is how close we can be while still being who we are."
languages.original_text: "И ты стал{mf||а}". {n}Маражай прикрывает глаза.{/n} "Ты разделил{mf||а} со мной мою страсть. Мою причину жить. Мое естество. Это — то, насколько мы можем быть близки, оставаясь теми кто мы есть".

traits.locale_text: "And now you are." {n}Marazhai's eyelids lower.{/n} "We shared my passion. My reason for living. My nature. This is how close we can be while still being who we are."
"And now you are." {n}Marazhai's eyelids lower.{/n} "We shared my passion. My reason for living. My nature. This is how close we can be while still being who we are."

"And now you are." {n}Marazhai's eyelids lower.{/n} "We shared my passion. My reason for living. My nature. This is how close we can be while still being who we are."

languages.text: “那你确实做到了。”{n}玛拉斋半垂下目光。{/n}“我们一起分享了我的激情，我存在的理由，我的本性。这便是我们在保持自我的前提下，最亲近的距离。”
languages.original_text: "And now you are." {n}Marazhai's eyelids lower.{/n} "We shared my passion. My reason for living. My nature. This is how close we can be while still being who we are."

traits.locale_text: “那你确实做到了。”{n}玛拉斋半垂下目光。{/n}“我们一起分享了我的激情，我存在的理由，我的本性。这便是我们在保持自我的前提下，最亲近的距离。”

languages.text: «Y ahora lo estás». {n}Marazhai baja los párpados.{/n} «Hemos compartido mi pasión. Mi razón para vivir. Mi naturaleza. Esto es todo lo cerca que podemos estar sin dejar de ser nosotros mismos».
languages.original_text: "And now you are." {n}Marazhai's eyelids lower.{/n} "We shared my passion. My reason for living. My nature. This is how close we can be while still being who we are."

traits.locale_text: «Y ahora lo estás». {n}Marazhai baja los párpados.{/n} «Hemos compartido mi pasión. Mi razón para vivir. Mi naturaleza. Esto es todo lo cerca que podemos estar sin dejar de ser nosotros mismos».

languages.text: « Et vous avez réussi. {n}Marazhai ferme les yeux.{/n} Avec vous, j'ai partagé ma passion. Ma raison de vivre. Ma nature. Nous ne pouvons pas être plus proches l'un de l'autre tout en demeurant fidèles à ce que nous sommes. »
languages.original_text: "And now you are." {n}Marazhai's eyelids lower.{/n} "We shared my passion. My reason for living. My nature. This is how close we can be while still being who we are."

traits.locale_text: « Et vous avez réussi. {n}Marazhai ferme les yeux.{/n} Avec vous, j'ai partagé ma passion. Ma raison de vivre. Ma nature. Nous ne pouvons pas être plus proches l'un de l'autre tout en demeurant fidèles à ce que nous sommes. »

languages.text: "Und das seid Ihr jetzt." {n}Marazhais Augenlider senken sich.{/n} "Wir haben meine Leidenschaft miteinander geteilt. Meinen Grund zum Leben. Meine Natur. So können wir uns ganz nah sein und trotzdem die bleiben, die wir sind."
languages.original_text: "And now you are." {n}Marazhai's eyelids lower.{/n} "We shared my passion. My reason for living. My nature. This is how close we can be while still being who we are."

traits.locale_text: "Und das seid Ihr jetzt." {n}Marazhais Augenlider senken sich.{/n} "Wir haben meine Leidenschaft miteinander geteilt. Meinen Grund zum Leben. Meine Natur. So können wir uns ganz nah sein und trotzdem die bleiben, die wir sind."

languages.text: 「そして今、お前はここにいる」{n}マラズハイはまぶたを閉じる。{/n}「俺たちは情熱をわかち合った。生きる理由を。俺様の本性を。俺たちはありのままの自分でありながら、これほどに共にあることができるのだ」
languages.original_text: "And now you are." {n}Marazhai's eyelids lower.{/n} "We shared my passion. My reason for living. My nature. This is how close we can be while still being who we are."

traits.locale_text: 「そして今、お前はここにいる」{n}マラズハイはまぶたを閉じる。{/n}「俺たちは情熱をわかち合った。生きる理由を。俺様の本性を。俺たちはありのままの自分でありながら、これほどに共にあることができるのだ」

languages.original_text: "And now you are." {n}Marazhai's eyelids lower.{/n} "We shared my passion. My reason for living. My nature. This is how close we can be while still being who we are."

languages.text: "Artık yakınsın." {n}Marazhai'ın göz kapakları iniyor.{/n} "Tutkumu, yaşama nedenimi, tabiatımı paylaştık. Benliğimizi koruyarak ancak bu kadar yakın olabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "And now you are." {n}Marazhai's eyelids lower.{/n} "We shared my passion. My reason for living. My nature. This is how close we can be while still being who we are."

traits.locale_text: "Artık yakınsın." {n}Marazhai'ın göz kapakları iniyor.{/n} "Tutkumu, yaşama nedenimi, tabiatımı paylaştık. Benliğimizi koruyarak ancak bu kadar yakın olabiliriz."
